data.title: LMH Peru Medical Center
data.meta_description: Get the care and treatments you need from one of Logansport Memorial Hospital’s doctors in Peru, Indiana, at the Peru Medical Center.
data.text:
Leave a Review

NOTICE TO PATIENTS:

This practice serves all patients regardless of the ability to pay. Discounts for essential services are offered on family size and income. For more information, ask at the front desk or visit our website. Click here to download the complete notice.

AVISO PARA PACIENTES:

Esta práctica atiende a todos los pacientes independientemente de su capacidad de pago. Se ofrecen descuentos para servicios esenciales según el tamaño de la familia y l los ingresos. Para más información, pregunte en la recepción o visite nuestro sitio web. Haga clic aquí para descargar el aviso completo.

Building Better Health, Right Here in Peru.

You deserve convenience and choice when it comes to managing your medical and wellness needs. Logansport Memorial's Peru Medical Center, inside the Miami County YMCA, offers an expanded range of services for you and your family -- primary care, specialty care, same-day or next-day appointments for sick visits, physical and occupational therapy, and more. With x-ray and laboratory services on-site, you can get what you need in one convenient location, before, during, or after your appointment. Complementary child watch is also available for patients, during their clinic appointments only.

Hours

Monday–Thursday 7:30 a.m. to 5 p.m.

Friday 7:30 a.m. to 4 p.m.

Saturday–Sunday closed

Services

Family Medicine

Internal Medicine

Dermatology

OB/GYN

Orthopedics

Therapy Services

Wound Care

The team you need to Build Better Health is right here -- for you -- at Peru Medical Center.

Therapy services available to you

Logansport Memorial Hospital's experienced physical therapy team helps patients develop, maintain, and restore maximum movement and function. Our team can provide treatment options to address troublesome issues including (but not limited to):

Post surgical recovery

Athletic injuries

Work related injuries

Joint replacements

Postpartum related difficulties

Peru Medical Center Therapy Services is conveniently located next to our clinic in Suite 200. To make an appointment, call (765) 919-4444.
